Description: "Sinhala letter aayanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ා.
"Sinhala letter taaluja shayanna". Part of the extended (miśra) repertoire (for Sanskrit, Pali, etc).
"Sinhala letter mahapraana dhayanna". Part of the extended (miśra) repertoire (for Sanskrit, Pali, etc).
"Sinhala letter uyanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ු.
"Sinhala letter iyanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ි.
"Sinhala letter kaeyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with keti aeda-pilla).
"Sinhala letter kaaeyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with diga aeda-pilla).
"Sinhala letter kiyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with keti is-pilla).
"Sinhala letter kiiyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with diga is-pilla).
"Sinhala letter kuyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with keti paa-pilla).
"Sinhala letter koyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with kombuwa and aela-pilla).
"Sinhala letter eyanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ෙ.
"Sinhala letter dantaja nayanna". Part of the extended (miśra) repertoire (for Sanskrit, Pali, etc).
